data.title: Current local time in Shimla, India time zone changes
data.meta_description: Find out current local time in Shimla as well as time zone changes and next clock adjustment time. Explore sunrise, sunset, moonrise and moonset time.
data.text:
Current local time in Shimla, India

Tuesday, August 27, 2024 at 06:15 +05:30

UTC/GMT Offset: +05:30 hours

Time zone: +05:30 - +05:30

Daylight saving: No daylight saving time in 2024

Shimla is a city in State of Himachal Pradesh in India

Put Shimla local time onto your personal world clock

What is the best time for call or meeting with someone in Shimla?

What's the local time in other places, when it's 6 pm in Shimla?

Time Zone & Daylight Saving Time

No daylight saving time used in 2024. Last clock adjustment was made at Sunday, October 14, 1945. See details below.

EventLocal Time or Time ZoneUTC/GMT OffsetDaylight saving time ended:Sunday, October 14, 1945

11:59:59 PM daylight time -> 11:00:00 PM standard time6:30 -> 5:30Current time zone:+05:30 - +05:30+5:30 hours

Sun

The timing of sunrise and sunset is calculated with respect to Shimla location as they are observed at sea level. Viewer may notice a few minutes difference depending on actual longitude and latitude, altitude, and local landscape.

Sunrise:

at 05:55 in direction 77° East by north

Sunset:

at 18:51 in direction 281° West by north

Day length:

12 hours 55 minutes (about 106 seconds shorter than yesterday)

TwilightBeginsEndsCivil twilight:05:3074° East by north19:15285° West by northNautical twilight:05:0070° East-northeast19:45289° West-northwestAstronomical twilight:04:3065° East-northeast20:15293° West-northwest

Moon

Just like for the Sun, moonrise and moonset are computed for Shimla location and actual timing may vary with viewer's actual location and altitude. While lunar phases remain constant for any location on Earth and depend only on relative positions of the Earth, Moon and Sun.

Moonrise:

No moonrise observed in Shimla today

Moonset:

No moonset observed in Shimla today
